*[https://www.4gltemall.com/bigpond-3g21wb.html ''NetComm Bigpond 3G21WB 3G Ultimate Gateway''] :Ports: 3x 10/100 (LAN), 1x 10/100 (WAN/LAN), 2x USB 2.0
The default credentials in this entry are based on the FCC label.
